original_text: Captain Nebuzaradan sent away as prisoners all the people who remained in Jerusalem. He also sent away those people who had agreed to serve the king of Babylon and the workers who were still there.
korean_text: 성 중에 남아 있는 백성과 바벨론 왕에게 항복한 자들과 무리 중 남은 자는 시위대장 느부사라단이 모두 사로잡아 가고

sentences.original_text: Captain Nebuzaradan sent away as prisoners
all the people who remained in Jerusalem
He also sent away those people
who had agreed to serve the king of Babylon
and the workers who were still there
